backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, journaling, squad groups, reports, and access control utilities with state maps and helper checks.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module returning old state as new state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring authentication, onboarding flow, routing, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Editor component for creating, updating, sharing, and deleting journal entries.
Authenticated app layout with navigation, user menu, mobile sheet, and route outlet.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Implements a two-step onboarding flow handling invite submission and disclaimer acceptance with error messaging and mutations.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportDi: Provides a dialog for submitting abuse reports with selectable reasons, optional details, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/content/disclaimer.ts: Exports the application's full disclaimer text about its unofficial status and user responsibilities.
frontend/src/content/modules.ts: Defines module-related interfaces and exports structured training modules with content and prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend user profiles, invites, disclaimers, journaling, and other mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReports.tsx: Displays and manages community reports for admins, including status updates and sorted report listings.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Fetches and displays community guidelines with a loading state and styled content.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Handles viewing, creating, and editing personal journal entries with optional prefilled content.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Shows learning modules filtered by category and allows navigating to create journal reflections.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLanding.tsx: Public landing page with platform overview, disclaimer, feature cards, and Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAbout.tsx: Renders the Settings & About page showing user profile details, disclaimer text, and app information sections.
frontend/src/pages/Squads.tsx: Shows the user’s squads and provides dialogs for creating or joining squads via invite codes.
frontend/src/pages/SquadSharedEntries.ts: Displays a squad’s shared journal entries, member list, invite-code management, and leave/report actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, and architecture for the invite‑only IC‑based journaling app.
